citation: Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (Transfer of Rail Infrastructure - Derwent Valley Corridor from Third Avenue to Back River Road) Notice 2021 (Tas)
text:
Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (Transfer of Rail Infrastructure - Derwent Valley Corridor from Third Avenue to Back River Road) Notice 2021

I make the following notice under section 100(1) of the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) Act 2016 .

30 November 2021

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

1. Short title
    This notice may be cited as the Strategic Infrastructure Corridors (Strategic and Recreational Use) (Transfer of Rail Infrastructure - Derwent Valley Corridor from Third Avenue to Back River Road) Notice 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This notice takes effect on 17 December 2021.

3. Transfer of rail infrastructure
    All rail infrastructure that is situated on the corridor named the Derwent Valley Corridor from Third Avenue to Back River Road is transferred to the Crown.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 December 2021

This notice is administered in the Department of State Growth.
